amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to funding for grants awarded by the Office on Violence Against Women.

vote.text: Amendment SA 101 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 101 proposed by Senator Heinrich. To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to funding for grants awarded by the Office on Violence Against Women.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 101 proposed by Senator Heinrich.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 101 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
